title: Wasp Stings Snake:In Another Bizarre Nature Video, A Wasp Stings A Coral Snake While It Was Feasting On A Dead Rat Snake
text:
It's A Snake Eat Snake World: Wasp Stings Coral Snake As It Tries To Feast On A Dead Rat Snake

It's A Snake Eat Snake World: Wasp Stings Coral Snake As It Tries To Feast On A Dead Rat Snake

In today's wild nature video, we have a snake eating another dead snake, but that's not all, we also have a fiesty wasp stinging a snake.

Twitter

Evangeline Cummings posted a video on Twitter of what appears to be a wasp stinging a coral snake that was dangling from a branch attempting to eat a dead snake.

Um ok, ⁦@UFEntomology⁩ and ⁦⁦@MartaWayneUF⁩ , I believe I just witnessed a BEE 🐝 stinging a CORAL SNAKE 🐍 while the CORAL was dining on a RAT (?) SNAKE 🐍 and I need your support to process this. ⁦⁦@UF⁩ #FloridaBackyard pic.twitter.com/djbJJGxaUk — Evangeline Cummings (@EvieCummings23) October 17, 2019

Cummings was in her Gainesville backyard when she noticed the coral snake trying to eat another snake when a wasp comes flying out of nowhere and launching a vicious sting.

Don't Miss 29.5 K SHARES 21.2 K SHARES 9.3 K SHARES 10.5 K SHARES 4.4 K SHARES

"I actually took an initial pic of the hanging snake and can now see (if I look closer) the coral snake," Cummings told ScienceAlert.

"I never thought a yellowjacket wasp would then join the fray," Cummings recalls. "That wasp just showed up while I was filming and it looked as though it stung the coral snake."

"It was truly an amazing experience to witness nature in action," said Cummings. And thanks to her quick wits and a camera, we get to enjoy it, too.

In the video, a wasp appears and starts circling the snake and stings, the snake can be seen writhing in pain right after.
description: In another bizarre video from the Nature, a snake trying to feats on another dead snakes gets vicious sting from a huge wasp. Evangeline Cummings posted a video on Twitter of what appears to be a wasp stinging a coral snake that was dangling from a branch attempting to eat a dead snake.
